purpose: To automate the creation of podcast content, including script writing and audio generation, using AI technology
principle: Utilizes large language models (LLMs) for script generation and audio synthesis APIs for producing audio
reusability: Offers modular AI components for script and audio generation that can be integrated into other media production workflows
limitations: May have limitations in handling highly specific topics or niche audio styles, and may require manual intervention for quality assurance
name: neuralnoise
